original_title: WENN DIE WELT ZU ENDE GEHT, WERDE ICH DICH GELIEBT HABEN
overview: Following a climate catastrophe, Andy uploads themself into the digital afterworld. Even though they have a hard time adapting to the digital world, the omnipresent superintelligence insists that paradise is right here. The film was mainly shot in the metaverse Second Life.
title: When the World Comes to an End, I Will Have Loved You
